content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (1.0, 1.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position 1.0, 1.0)

### Wooden chest at position (3.5, 1.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden chest (position 3.5, 1.5)

### Copper plate mine at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position (y1)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position (y1)
- Assembling machine at position (z1) and inserter at position (a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position) that connects the furnace at position y1 to assembling machine at position (z1)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when crafting items due to missing resources
- Gather all required resources before attempting to craft an item. For example, wood is required to craft a wooden chest.

### Errors when placing an entity too far away
- Move closer to the target position before attempting to place an entity. The maximum distance for placement is 10 tiles.
